description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ac6e2","text":"Hnasko lab- preparation of Holding ACSF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2leu3","text":"Holding ACSF is used for incubating brain slices prior to cell-attached or whole-cell electrophysiological recordings of neurons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2pr2c","text":"NaCl (Fisher Scientific, cat# BP358)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1chgt","text":"KCl (Fisher Scientific, cat# BP366)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clhl2","text":"NaH2PO4 (Fisher Scientific, cat# BP329)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":3,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":6,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akjhi","text":"D-glucose (Sigma Aldrich, cat# G8270)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i6po","text":"CaCl2 (Fisher Scientific, cat# BP510)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rdb1","text":"MgSO4  (Fisher Scientific, cat# M80)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq173","text":"NaHCO3 (Fisher Scientific, cat# BP328)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":5,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v2mn","text":"Thiourea (Sigma Aldrich, cat# T8656)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gbil","text":"Na-Ascorbate (Sigma Aldrich, cat# A7631)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v6qc","text":"Na-Pyruvate (Sigma Aldrich, cat# P5280)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57nbo","text":"Composition of   of 10X Holding ACSF (in mM): 1150 NaCl, 25 KCl, 12.3 NaH2PO4, 100 d-glucose, 20 CaCl2 and 20 MgSO4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":73,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":76,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":101,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":114,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"vstv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5d36d","text":"Composition of   of 10X Holding ACSF (in g): 67.2 NaCl, 1.86 KCl, 1.47 NaH2PO4, 18.02 d-glucose, 2.94 CaCl2 and 4.93 MgSO4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":74,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":77,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":106,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":121,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1323p","text":"Dissolve all salts in   of ddH2O to make 10X stock solution of Holding ACSF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":30,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4o5hs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2b2v9","text":"Dilute   of 10X solution to ~   with ddH2O and add (in mM): 26 NaHCO3, 2 thiourea, 5 Na-ascorbate and 3 Na-pyruvate; (in g): 2.18 NaHCO3, 0.15 thiourea, 0.98 Na-ascorbate and 0.33 Na-pyruvate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":40,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":68,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":135,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5lgv","text":"Bubble the solution with carbogen (95% O2 5% CO2) for ~10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":40,"length":2},{"style":"sub","offset":47,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dao5o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hui9","text":"After bubbling, measure and adjust pH of solution to ~   with 12 N HCl (\u003c1 ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5t3ph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.3"}}}}
